attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am writing to petition agaist the recently imposed Tax on 4x4 vehicles.  As a caravan Owner I purchased a 4x4 purely for the purpose of towing a family caravan.  In doing so I holiday mainly in the UK this indiscriminate stealth Tax, veiled as a green tax. Penalises those who have chosen to holiday in the Uk and therefore spend their disposable income within the british economy.

Let's not forget that Caravaning an Leisure is a growing industry.  In choosing to caravan I do not travel by air, an acknowledged major pollluter, but politically too sensitive.  Instead I holiday in this country supporting rural and tourist economies.  I like thousands other who caravan also support the caravan industry both nmanufacturers and accessory suppliers.  The Government should consider this fully when making abitary decisions to win votes.

I recall the HGV actions taken in recent years in response to fuel increases and feel as abody we need to make our voice heard. Maybe as a coordinated  body through bodies such as the Caravan Club and the Caravan and Camping Club we need to plan a day of actio when we all take to the road in protest!  Sign up if you agree?

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
